risk_of_persecution: fear of persecution from anti-PA groups
potential targeting as a political dissident
decision_reasoning: failure to assess the sur place claim
credibility issues based on inconsistencies and lack of corroborating evidence
application_details: judicial review application under subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
conclusion_outcome: legal error by not assessing the sur place claim
decision set aside and referred for redetermination
